author: Jack Moore
description: The attack comes after twin suicide bombings on churches in Egypt on Palm Sunday.
title: Gunmen killed 26 Coptic Christians in Egypt as they drove to a monastery

author: Heba Farouk Mahfouz, Heba Farouk Mahfouz
description: The attack marked the latest bloodshed targeting Egypt’s embattled Christian minority.
title: Gunmen kill at least 28 Coptic Christians in central Egypt

author: Hamza Hendawi & Mohammed Wagdy / AP
description: Egypt has been hit by a wave of attacks on its Christian minority
title: Gunmen in Egypt Attack Bus Carrying Coptic Christians, Killing 28

author: Dahlia Kholaif
description: Gunmen killed at least 28 people on a bus carrying Christian pilgrims in Egypt on Friday, prompting Egypt’s President Abdel Fattah Al Sisi to order retaliatory airstrikes in Libya as he faces an emerging national security crisis.
title: Gunmen in Egypt Attack Bus Carrying Coptic Christians, Prompting Airstrikes on Libya

description: Masked gunmen attack a group of Coptic Christians in southern Egypt, killing 28 people and wounding 25 others, the country's Health Ministry says.
title: Gunmen kill 28 Coptic Christians in Egypt

author: https://www.facebook.com/NBCNews
description: Christians make up around 10 percent of Egypt's mostly Muslim population of 83 million.
title: Masked gunmen kill 26 Christians heading to a monastery in Egypt

description: CAIRO: Gunmen on Friday opened fire on a bus carrying Coptic Christians in southern Egypt, killing at least 23 people.
title: Gunmen kill 23 Coptic Christians in Egypt - Times of India

author: Doug Stanglin
description: The attack follows a recent visit by Pope Francis to Egypt in part to show his support for the Christian minority.
title: Egypt attack: Gunmen kill at least 28 Coptic Christians in bus ambush

author: John Hayward
description: Egypt's warplanes attacked militant camps in eastern Libya to retaliate for the slaughter of 28 Coptic Christians by masked gunmen.
title: Egypt Retaliates for Coptic Bus Massacre with Airstrikes on Libyan Terrorist Camps - Breitbart

author: Nagwa el-Hamzawi, Housam Ahmed and Angela Dewan, CNN
description: At least 28 people were killed in Egypt after unidentified gunmen opened fire on a bus carrying Coptic Christians in what officials are calling a terror attack.
title: Egypt: At least 28 die in Coptic Christian bus attack
